Name: Andalusia
Description: Located in the southern part of Spain, known for its beautiful beaches, historic cities like Seville, and vibrant culture.

Name: Catalonia
Description: A northeastern region known for its rich culture, architecture by Gaudí, and the city of Barcelona.

Name: Madrid
Description: The capital region, which includes Madrid, Spain s political and cultural heart, known for its art museums and vibrant nightlife.

Name: Valencia
Description: On the eastern coast, known for its beaches, the City of Arts and Sciences, and its delicious paella.

Name: Castile and León
Description: Located in the northwest, famous for its medieval castles, charming towns, and historic landmarks.

Name: Basque Country
Description: Known for its unique language, culture, cuisine (especially pintxos), and the coastal city of Bilbao.

Name: Galicia
Description: Located in the northwest, famous for its lush greenery, beautiful coastline, and the city of Santiago de Compostela.

Name: Castilla-La Mancha
Description: Located in central Spain, known for its windmills, medieval towns, and its association with Don Quixote.

Name: Aragon
Description: Located in northeastern Spain, known for its Pyrenean mountain range and historic cities like Zaragoza.

Name: Canary Islands
Description: An archipelago off the northwest coast of Africa, known for its volcanic landscapes, beaches, and tourism.

Name: Balearic Islands
Description: Located in the Mediterranean, famous for islands like Mallorca, Ibiza, and Menorca, known for their stunning beaches.

Name: Murcia
Description: Located in southeastern Spain, known for its Mediterranean climate, beaches, and the city of Murcia.

Name: Extremadura
Description: Located in the southwest, known for its natural parks, historical towns, and Roman ruins.

Name: La Rioja
Description: Located in the north, known for its wine production, particularly the Rioja wine, and its picturesque landscapes.
